Text: O agaji, kʼe̩ ma bi o̩ma n, keli ke;
Todu uwe̩ agbʼane̩ nyʼo̩wo̩ rʼo̩wo̩ awo̩to̩ kpai awohi, amugbe̩-we̩ la ane̩ abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi,
E̩ ki railo n, todu anyo̩ amʼe̩ n;
Iko re oñ u dʼuwe̩ tinyo̩,
Todu e-kide̩ chebiu omi Noa ñw mi:
Todu dagba uwo uwo ki kwo
O uwe̩ e̩no̩bata, kʼafu ibi arʼuwe̩ nyʼojale le̩, kʼe̩do̩-we̩ ma nyi n,
U la ako okuta rubi che o̩ñwe̩ jʼojokunyi-we̩ lale,
Amo̩ma-we̩ chaka achʼabo ku Jihofa ko̩ ma e̩wñ,
e̩wñ ido̩na ogu du ku ma gwu ku
